reviews.review: 9 years after : still 64 tick server , still no Anti cheat, still no anti smurf but skins !!! What a joke you are Valve , a disgrace.

It is CS:GO, an introduction is hardly needed. A clean gameplay with an emphasis on aim and teamwork with a high skill ceiling.
One of the best games of all time.

This fps is a emotional rollercoaster. I have felt moments of joy, moments of rage and moments of pure depression. It's a love-hate relationship. I love the game, but hate it at the same time. I would recommend this game to anyone looking for a competitive experience during the corona lockdown xD.

Transfer so fucking well into other games. Holy shit I remember when I first played Destiny 2 Crucible right after quitting CSGO. 

Needless to say I was a god. And at the far side, at that.
Awesome game, a lot of fun playing it. Hope community will get better, but everything else is perfect!
You'll learn Russian by playing this game. Rosetta Stone ain't got nothing!
Lost most of my friends. 10/10 would recommend
